1.title: Mutt's Sauce
1.subtitle: In 1956, Mutt got the idea to make a sauce he could use for every meal. Mutt’s sauce was a multi-purpose specialty sauce, infusing sweet, tangy and a little bit of heat into each spoonful.

products.name: Combo 3 Pack
products.description: BEST VALUE! Try all three: Original, Sweet N Spicy, Ghost Pepper

products.name: Deluxe Spices 3 Pack
products.description: It took 7 years to decide on what flavors to introduce in our spice line. These spices are unique because when paired with Mutt's Sauce, you can create three limited edition flavors.

products.name: Deluxe Combo Pack — Sauce + Spices
products.description: This is the ultimate gift for Cooking with Mutt's Sauce!  Try the sauces:  Gluten Free Original, Sweet N Spicy, and Ghost Pepper, as well as our new line of spices: Berbere, Garlic Ghost Pepper, and Onion Pepper.

1.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
1.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

2.title: Cuff
2.subtitle: A platform for creating mature conversations through discussions of love and dating experiences.

2.title: Ruth Nathan's
2.subtitle: It is Nicole R. Brown's desire that Ruth Nathan’s does not only make customers look spectacular but feel spectacular as well, positively influencing them to feel better about themselves. It is a known fact that when one dresses well, one feels better—and from an outfit that is well put together, that makes one walk with pride, the Urban Peacock emerges.

products.name: Blue Curved Mask
products.description: Still want to look dapper while protecting yourself and others? We have the answer! Reusable and re-washable, these fabric masks will keep you looking good and doing good. When you buy a curved face mask from Ruth Nathan’s we donate a rectangular face mask to health care professionals and essential workers in need.

products.name: Franc Bleu Bow Tie
products.description: The deep older brother of the Franc Un pattern, the Franc Bleu’s watercolor pen lines convey elegance and a truly historic sense of style. Also inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Bleu carries notes of art deco, dancing under the stars, and midnight.

products.name: Franc Un Pocket Square
products.description: Inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Un pattern gives off a refined yet playful vibe sure to elevate your look during formal occasions. Perfect for when you want to be taken seriously—but not too seriously. Notes of Art Deco, French Quarter jazz, and pistachios.

3.title: Learn about Julius Jones
3.subtitle: Listen to the Jason Flom & Kim Kardashian West talk about Julius Jones’ story.

3.title: Fight for Breonna
3.subtitle: Breonna survived the frontlines of a pandemic that disproportionately kills Black people, only to have her life stolen by police. Take Action.

4.title: Mystic Momma
4.subtitle: Specializing in teas, tinctures, yoni steams, sitz baths, blends for hormone balance, reproductive health and womb wellness.

products.name: Vital-A-Tea
products.description: In TCM, the heart is said to house the Shen. Shen is best described as the spirit/soul, but also encompasses the  mind. So what better way to revitalize Shen then to experience this high vitamin and mineral tea full of heart healthy herbs!

products.name: Ultimate Gold body butter
products.description: This hydrating aloe and shea body butter is an indulgent treat for the body.  Layer over skin after a warm shower. May refrigerate this body butter for a cooling effect and longer shelf life.

products.name: Cleansing Herbs
products.description: The Mystic Momma Cleansing Herbs includes a strong dose of herbs to help clean out the uterus and improve blood circulation to the mid-section. The herbs included promote circulation, balance the vaginal flora, improve scent, tighten skin, clear out excess mucus and nourish the reproductive organs.

4.title: African-American Heroism in the Military
4.subtitle: Dating all the way back to the American Revolution, African-Americans have played key roles in the history (and success) of the U.S. military. Profiled below are some notable African-Americans and their achievements, as well as milestones in the integration of African-Americans in the U.S. military.

5.title: First police report in Tyre Nichols case does not match video
5.subtitle: An initial police report filed in the hours after the Tyre Nichols traffic stop suggested he was violent and made claims that were contradicted by video later released by police.

5.title: Uncivil Podcast
5.subtitle: Uncivil brings you stories that were left out of the official history of the Civil War, ransacks America's past, and takes on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about resistance, covert operations, corruption, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more.

6.title: Soul Impactful
6.subtitle: Soul Impactful strongly believes in the divine power of the universe and we also believe that every being has access to this Source. Our purpose is to provide you with tools to aid you in your spiritual journey and cheer on your glo' up!

products.name: Chalcedony 108 Bead Meditation Bracelet
products.description: A quiet moment of reflection, gratitude, and visualization is sometimes all that is needed to redirect your mentality in a positive manner.

products.name: Black Jasper Tumbled Stone
products.description: Black Jasper is a highly protective stone that is excellent for grounding the energies of people who may experience being off with the fairies. It can also help in earthing higher vibrations.

products.name: Bloom and Monk Incense Collection
products.description: Each incense holder is made with exquisite workmanship that creates a meditative effect.

6.title: QuintesScential Candles
6.subtitle: Since we love burning scented candles, we decided to embark on our journey of becoming Black chandlers. We decided, from the beginning, to use only the healthiest ingredients in anything that we make and sell.

products.name: Earthy
products.description: Earthy is a sensual fragrance that lives up to its name. Our Earthy is aromatic, woodsy, and intoxicating, with a prominent sandalwood base, complemented by layers of sage, spice, and amber.

products.name: Sweet Dreams
products.description: Ready for bed? Time to unwind from a hectic day? Escape with gentle notes of lavender on your pillow with the crisp scent of freshly washed linen.

products.name: Pleasantry
products.description: Our Pleasantry is a proven pleaser, combining a patented odor neutralizing technology with a crisp, clean fragrance that brings to mind fresh linens drying on the line. Pleasantry doesn't just cover up unwanted smells, it cancels them out.

7.title: Designs by Tee LLC
7.subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

7.title: Book: Understanding Mass Incarceration
7.subtitle: A People's Guide to the Key Civil Rights Struggle of Our Time

8.title: Remembering South African leader Nelson Mandela
8.subtitle: Nelson Mandela, the first black president of South Africa credited with ending apartheid there, died in Johannesburg on Dec. 5, 2013. Former PBS NewsHour correspondent Charlayne Hunter-Gault takes a look back at Mandela's life and legacy.

8.title: Accountability in a Time of Justice
8.subtitle: Accountability is a well-worn word in social justice circles. We have worked hard to figure out what accountability means to us as we attempt to walk our social justice talk.

9.title: Jungalow
9.subtitle: Black-owned home decor store selling furniture, bed and bath products, planters, and more.

products.name: Tigress Tangerine Rug by Justina Blakeney® X Loloi
products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

products.name: Mary Jane Hook Pillow by Justina Blakeney
products.description: We love the bold contrasting colors of the teal leaf motif against the fresh peachy-orange. The square shape is easy to toss anywhere – a 'chill out chair', a cozy pillow pit on the floor... anywhere you imagine. Hint: This pillows makes for a rad gift for your mellow homies!

products.name: Peace Vase by Justina Blakeney®
products.description: Bold and colorful vessels with personality are kind of our thing here at Jungalow. These Peace Vases will add just the right amount of charm to your #shelfie. Fill with dried foraged flowers or fronds and display it as a sculptural focal point on your entryway table or mantle.

9.title: Children's Books Starring Kids of Color
9.subtitle: Jambo Books is a children's book subscription company.  We send our members 2 or 3 books each month that feature a child of color as the star of a fiction story.
9.moreInfo:
Jambo Books serves children from birth to age 13. Our oldest members, ages 10-13, receive a middle grade novel and a nonfiction companion book that expands on a topic discussed in the novel. We focus on stories about children of color to delight your young readers and reaffirm your values of creating an inclusive and welcoming community.

Jambo means “Hello” in Swahili. Hello is an invitation to start a connection, to learn something new, to expand our notion of what it is to be human. Similarly, we invite our readers to build their own empathy muscles by reading about people who aren't exactly like themselves. Together, we affirm the humanity of every person.

10.title: Aisha Likes It
10.subtitle:
It began with a problem. I kept looking for the kind of refined, eclectic, Afrobohemian jewelry I really wanted to wear to no avail. Certainly, there was Africa-inspired jewelry available, but much of it lacked the bohemian design aesthetic that fit my taste and style as an African American literature professor. I wanted pieces that could say a lot without doing a lot. My jewelry needed to standout and be distinctive while remaining wearable. I wanted a jewelry wardrobe that reflected my tastes, my passions, my culture, my research interests. And so I began to make my own, sourcing authentic, African diasporic materials, curating and refining my work as my knowledge and skill developed. Eventually, I decided to share my work and Aisha Likes It came into existence.

Aisha Likes it is home to African-inspired jewelry curated towards a bohemian aesthetic created with both ethically sourced materials from throughout the African diaspora and traditional semi-precious stones. Each piece is designed to make a statement at a fair price.

10.title: Mass Incarceration: Visualized
10.subtitle: Concrete actions, more than stated beliefs, are a true reflection of values, both personal and societal. We may claim to value human life, but our societal actions and policies say otherwise.

11.title: Land Acknowledgement App
11.subtitle: Text the name of a city and state to 855-917-5263 to find out the Indigenous people of that place.

11.title: Gifts for the Spirit
11.subtitle: An independently run, spiritually driven, boutique for the soul

products.name: Melanated Classic Tarot
products.description: Various races and nationalities practice tarot for healing and education, but it's hard to heal and learn with tools that don't represent you. This deck is a solution to that problem.

products.name: Bel Meditation Candle Set
products.description: The BEL uses fire, gravity, and sound to measure time. When the candle is lit, wax melts and eventually a pin falls, landing with a resonant ding - a beautiful way to end your meditation.

products.name: Small Garnierite Palm Stone
products.description: Known as the stone of the Goddess Gaia, GARNIERITE (also called Green Moonstone), is a rare form of Moonstone used for emotional healing, balance, and freedom.

12.title: United Negro College Fund
12.subtitle: UNCF envisions a nation where all Americans have equal access to a college education that prepares them for rich intellectual lives, competitive and fulfilling careers, engaged citizenship and service to our nation.

12.title: Justice for Tete Gulley
12.subtitle: Tete Gulley was a 31 year old queer Black transient. She was also known by some of her family as Otis. She was found hanging from a tree on the evening of May 27th 2019 in Rocky Butte Park. The cause of death was determined to be suicide at the scene but there is evidence of foul play.

13.title: When the Negro Leagues Played Through the Great Depression and WWII
13.subtitle: The Negro Leagues struggled financially amid systemic racism and segregation—even before the Great Depression disproportionately devastated Black America. But the game's finest days—with transcendent stars like Satchel Paige and Josh Gibson—still lay ahead.

13.title: Black Lives Matter
13.subtitle: We appreciate your support of the movement and our ongoing fight to end state-sanctioned violence, liberate Black people, and end white supremacy forever.

14.title: How to Be an Antiracist
14.subtitle: Ibram X. Kendi's concept of antiracism reenergizes and reshapes the conversation about racial justice in America—but even more fundamentally, points us toward liberating new ways of thinking about ourselves and each other.

14.title: Kintu New York
14.subtitle: Kintu handbags are designed in New York, co-developed with global artisans, and made in Italy. The Kintu brand appeals to the dynamic, busy, urban woman who values quality and self-expression.

15.title: Natural Cuties
15.subtitle: Natural Cuties is a brand that promotes, encourages and highlights the beauty of African American hair in its natural state! #Iamanaturalcutie are you?

products.name: I am a Natural Cutie Book
products.description: Phoenix is excited about rocking her big afro puffs on the first day of Kindergarten. After hearing the other girls make fun of her puffs she is ready to go home. She will soon learn just what it means to be a NATURAL Cutie!

products.name: Drawstring Bag
products.description: Combine your love for vibrant prints and a sporty style with a cool drawstring bag. It’s a must-have gym essential that can be worn as a backpack with drawstring closure at top, and narrow, contrasting shoulder straps.

products.name: Mug
products.description: Whether you’re drinking your morning coffee, your evening tea, or something in between – this mug’s for you! It’s sturdy and glossy with a vivid print that’ll withstand the microwave and dishwasher.

15.title: Color of Change
15.subtitle: Color Of Change was founded in moments just like this one. As Black communities reeled in grief as all levels of government failed to protect Black people in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, we recognized that not enough of the people and institutions with power over our lives had any fear of disappointing Black people. For the last 15 years, we've focused on building that power.

16.title: Martin Luther King, Jr: 7 Surprising Facts
16.subtitle: In his 39 years (1929-1968) Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. became one of the leading figures in the civil rights movement.

16.title: The Pan-African Congresses, 1900-1945
16.subtitle: In the nearly half century between 1900 and 1945, various political leaders and intellectuals from Europe, North America, and Africa met six times to discuss colonial control of Africa and develop strategies for eventual African political liberation.

17.title: Gentleman AF
17.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

17.title: Free Minds Book Club
17.subtitle: Change lives today. Donate now to support incarcerated and formerly incarcerated youths and adults.

18.title: The New Jim Crow
18.subtitle: The New Jim Crow is a stunning account of the rebirth of a caste-like system in the United States, one that has resulted in millions of African Americans locked behind bars and then relegated to a permanent second-class status—denied the very rights supposedly won in the Civil Rights Movement.

18.title: Four-year Analysis: Police-related deaths across racial groups
18.subtitle: A four-year research study released on June 24th, 2020 shows that Black Americans were, on average, more than three times as likely as White Americans to be killed during a police encounter.

19.title: Liberation Library
19.subtitle: Young people in the jails and prisons we serve are experiencing a loss of programming and in-person family visits, leading to further isolation during these uncertain times. We believe it is now more important than ever for incarcerated young people to have access to other worlds of their choosing.

19.title: Sade Baron
19.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. As a 100% woman-owned business, they select every ingredient in their products. Everything is handmade, carefully packaged, and personally checked for impeccable quality.

products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set
products.description: With this Go Clean Body Care Starter Set you can finally remove excessive ingredients and chemicals from your daily body care routine. With Sade Baron, all of our products are 100% vegan, made with clean ingredients to work for most skin types, so you can trust that you'll find great products to work for you.

products.name: Fragrance Free Body Wash
products.description: A light face and body wash suitable for everyday use. This fragrance-free body wash is perfect for babies, children and adults with reactive and sensitive skin. With superfats galore like avocado oil, olive oil and more, this liquid castile soap will leave your skin hydrated day after day.

20.title: Let Sha'Carri Run!
20.subtitle: Sign the petition to reinstate Sha'Carri Richardson and allow this world-class athlete to compete in the 100-meter dash! And revisit the outdated rules around marijuana and athletes.

20.title: Microaggressions Are A Big Deal: How To Talk Them Out And When To Walk Away
20.subtitle: Microaggressions are defined as the everyday, subtle, intentional — and oftentimes unintentional — interactions or behaviors that communicate some sort of bias toward historically marginalized groups. Learn more in this podcast from NPR.

21.title: Derek Chauvin Is Sentenced To 22 1/2 Years For George Floyd's Murder
21.subtitle: A Minnesota judge sentenced Derek Chauvin to 22 1/2 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd — a punishment that exceeds the state's minimum guidelines but falls short of prosecutors' request of a 30-year sentence.

21.title: Seven factors that contribute to American racism
21.subtitle: Of the seven factors the researchers identified, perhaps the most insidious is passivism or passive racism, which includes an apathy toward systems of racial advantage or denial that those systems even exist.

22.title: Post 21
22.subtitle: Post 21 was created by a Mother-Daughter duo who wanted a comprehensive marketplace that focused on products from Black-owned businesses. They felt strongly that there’s no reason why these products are consistently being discovered when they should be household names. So, they said let’s create the place we want to shop.

products.name: Ball is Life Dog Tag
products.description: Super cool, fun, and durable Pet ID Tags. There's a tag for you and your pet's personality! Comes with custom engraving, to make sure that your little one is never lost and can always find it's way home.

products.name: B is for Black Boy
products.description: B is for Black Boy was written to celebrate the awe-inspiring nature of the Black male. It speaks life into our Black boys and empowers them to manifest their highest potential. It's intended to author and assert positive representation of Black boys to all audiences.

products.name: Headband
products.description: Handmade upcycled padded headband, with satin ribbon on underside next to hair.

22.title: What it takes to be racially literate
22.subtitle: Over the last year, Priya Vulchi and Winona Guo traveled to all 50 US states, collecting personal stories about race and intersectionality. Now they're on a mission to equip every American with the tools to understand, navigate and improve a world structured by racial division.

23.title: Aloha Glamour
23.subtitle:
Aloha Glamour is a lifestyle movement that promotes women loving themselves wholeheartedly. We are a community of women that empower others to use find and use their voice to turn their tragedies into triumphs and their mess into a message which enables them to build from the inside out...seeing and LIVING in color again. 

Thanks to our inspiring collections and our impeccable customer service, we have been highly successful since day one. Browse through our site and check out the latest additions to our collection, and feel free to get in touch with our team if you need any assistance.

We want you to create a story in each and every Aloha Glamour piece that you wear. What's the color of your story?

23.title: Martin Luther King Jr.’s ‘Letter From Birmingham Jail’
23.subtitle: In April 1963, King was jailed in Birmingham, Alabama. While there, he wrote a lengthy letter in the margins of a newspaper, and smuggled it out with the help of his lawyer. The eloquent call for “constructive, nonviolent tension” to force an end to unjust laws became a landmark document of the civil-rights movement.

24.title: The Hate U Give
24.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

24.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
24.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

25.title: Harrison Blake Apparel
25.subtitle: Harrison Blake Apparel has found a way to deliver high quality men's accessories at a great price. The style and variety of products are sure to please any gentleman.

products.name: Mandarin Dot Necktie
products.description: A great cotton necktie - in a beautiful design and color scheme = priceless! Grab yours now. Get compliments later...

products.name: Mauve Blossom Pocket Square
products.description: Handcrafted 100% fine cotton pocket square. Measures aprox 10" x 10"

products.name: 4 Layer Beet Bracelet
products.description: The perfect bracelet can add the finishing touch to your outfit. The smallest details often say the most. Add this stylish accessory to your collection.

25.title: TGEU International Women’s Day - Inclusivity Media Statement
25.subtitle: On the occasion of the International Women’s Day (IWD) on 8 March, TGEU joins the voices of trans people around the world in denouncing oppression, violence, and hate against women and non-binary people in all spheres of life.

26.title: Charge the cops who shot Jacob Blake
26.subtitle: Jacob Blake, 29, was shot by Kenosha, Wisconsin police officers in the back 7 times on August 23, 2020. Officers were on the scene due to a fight, which Jacob Blake was trying to break up. The cops who shot him need to be charged.

26.title: #ChooseToChallenge - International Women's Day
26.subtitle: A challenged world is an alert world. Individually, we're all responsible for our own thoughts and actions - all day, every day. We can all choose to challenge and call out gender bias and inequality. We can all choose to seek out and celebrate women's achievements. Collectively, we can all help create an inclusive world. From challenge comes change, so let's all choose to challenge.

27.title: Biased: Uncovering the Hidden Prejudice That Shapes What We See, Think, and Do
27.subtitle: With a perspective that is at once scientific, investigative, and informed by personal experience, Dr. Jennifer Eberhardt offers us the language and courage we need to face one of the biggest and most troubling issues of our time.

27.title: How to overcome our biases? Walk boldly toward them
27.subtitle: Our biases can be dangerous, even deadly — as we've seen in the cases of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, and Eric Garner, in Staten Island, New York. Diversity advocate Vernā Myers looks closely at some of the subconscious attitudes we hold toward out-groups. She makes a plea to all people: Acknowledge your biases.

28.title: 3 ways to speak English
28.subtitle: Jamila Lyiscott is a "tri-tongued orator" in her powerful spoken-word essay "Broken English," she celebrates — and challenges — the three distinct flavors of English she speaks with her friends, in the classroom and with her parents. As she explores the complicated history and present-day identity that each language represents, she unpacks what it means to be "articulate."

28.title: 210 Teas
28.subtitle:
Inspired by the 5 bags of black tea brewed  on my late grandmother’s stove, that were to later be stirred with sugar and offered to anyone that entered her kitchen, 210 Teas honors the subtle yet strong essence of my grandmother. For me, tea is a reminder of my family – a reminder of generational love. Tea provides a soothing sense of comfort that speaks without words, like the omnipresent protection of your ancestors.

The mission of 210 Teas is to share that comfort with everyone I can reach. From my cup … to yours, with love.

29.title: Tyre Nichols remembered as beautiful soul with creative eye
29.subtitle: On most weekends, Tyre Nichols would head to the city park, train his camera on the sky and wait for the sun to set. Learn more in this article from the Associated Press.

29.title: MLK: The Other America
29.subtitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s 1967 speech at Stanford. Here, he expounds on his nonviolent philosophy and methodology.

30.title: The Other Wes Moore
30.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

30.title: Askanya
30.subtitle: Les Chocolateries Askanya is Haiti’s first and only premier bean-to-bar chocolate company. We exclusively use Haitian cacao to produce our chocolates in our facility located in Ouanaminthe, Haiti.

products.name: Bouquet Vert
products.description: Bouquet Vert is our Lime Chocolate Bar - a dark and rich cacao bar infused with with mellow, floral and citrus - feels like a rich earth and lime trees in full bloom. There are notes of candied lime and something toasty. It's a slow melt, but that only helps savoring each new layer of flavor.

products.name: Paradis
products.description: Paradis has a rich and creamy texture, with delicious chocolate flavors and subtle fruit flavors, providing additional complexity.

products.name: Wanga Nègès
products.description: Wanga Nègès is creamy and smooth, with a rich, chocolate taste and a complex mélange, from caramel to dried fruit.

31.title: Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption
31.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.

31.title: Official Black Wall Street
31.subtitle: Get thousands of Black-owned businesses at your fingertips with the largest online platform for Black businesses.
